Package fr.liglab.adele.icasa.service.scheduler

Interface Summary
ICasaRunnable This Interface is the parent interface allowing to schedule tasks using the iCasa Clock Clock
PeriodicRunnable An OSGi service providing this interface will allow to schedule periodic tasks using the iCasa Clock Clock
ScheduledRunnable An OSGi service providing this interface will allow to schedule tasks at a fixed date using the iCasa Clock Clock
SchedulingManager User: torito Date: 6/26/13 Time: 2:00 PM
SpecificClockPeriodicRunnable An OSGi service providing this interface will allow to schedule periodic tasks using the a provided Clock Clock.
SpecificClockScheduledRunnable An OSGi service providing this interface will allow to schedule a task at a specified time using the a provided Clock Clock.
TaskExecutionReport User: torito Date: 6/14/13 Time: 2:54 PM
TaskReference The reference to a task scheduled for one or more executions on the SchedulerService.
